name: stringy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
similar to string: He had long, lank, stringy hair. The meat was tough and stringy (= unpleasant to eat because of being similar to pieces of string).

having the appearance of strings, or (of food) hard to chew: stringy meat His black hair was stringy and brushed his shoulders.
